hadiths.text: Jabir said:The last practice of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was that he did not perform ablution after taking anything that was cooked with the help of fire. Abu Dawud said: This is the abridgment of the former tradition

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي تَرْكِ الْوُضُوءِ مِمَّا مَسَّتِ النَّارُ
chapter.eng-name: Not Performing Wudu' FRom [Food Which Had Been Cooked] Over Fire
